description.string:
Explore Johnson & Johnson's history of groundbreaking improvements and innovations that have shaped and improved people's lives everywhere.
Discover the story behind the beginning of Johnson & Johnson and key figures that shaped our culture of innovation.

keyword.string: Heritage, Johnson & Johnson, history, innovation, onboarding, enterprise, Band-aid, Bandaid, sutures
